name: Falcon the Hunter

trait.name: Archer
text: A longbow or shortbow deals one extra die of its damage when Falcon hits with it (included in his longbow attack).

trait.name: Sharpshooter
text: Falcon's ranged weapon attacks ignore half cover and three-quarters cover.

action.name: Multiattack
text: Falcon makes three melee attacks or two ranged attacks.

action.name: Longsword
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d8 + 2) slashing damage, or 7 (1d10 + 2) slashing damage if used with two hands.

action.name: Longbow
text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. 11 (2d8 + 2) piercing damage.

description:
Adventurers encounter Falcon the Hunter if they visit his hunting lodge in Neverwinter Wood.
Source: Essentials Kit: Dragon of Icespire Peak p. 56
